attributes.action: ensure that all airports give access to free bagage weighting machines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that airlines are so pedantic about bagage weights, airports should make available bagage weighing machines for passengers to check the weight before they check in. It would save a great deal of hassle and time.

rejection.details: Please contact your airline with your suggestion.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
